projects.name: Rate-Limited URL Shortener
projects.description: Scalable URL-shortening service with API-key auth and Redis token-bucket rate limiting, following clean-architecture patterns and Docker-orchestrated micro-services.

projects.name: Employee Manager Suite
projects.description: Multiple CRUD variants of an employee-management app showcasing MVC, Razor Pages, Web API + jQuery, Angular, and Blazor stacks, using async/await, EF Core, and JWT-secured calls.

projects.name: Marketplace
projects.description: Online multi-shop marketplace with product management, search listings, and end-to-end shopping-cart flow, implemented using the MERN stack with JWT authentication.

projects.name: FinanceTracker
projects.description: Full-stack personal finance management app with account, transaction, and budget tracking, real-time balance updates, category-wise budgets, and dashboard insights. User authentication and session management secured via JWT.

projects.name: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack expense tracking system with CRUD operations, category-wise expenditure analytics, and interactive data visualization using MongoDB aggregation and Victory charts.

projects.name: Classroom
projects.description: Online classroom platform supporting multiple roles (educator/student), with course creation, lesson management, enrollment, progress tracking, and instructor analytics. Full-stack integration with backend APIs and React components.
